abstract: Canadian court gives Chiheb Esseghaier and Raed Jaser life sentences for terrorist plot to derail passenger train; judge rejects Jaser's entrapment defense and rules Esseghaier, who is probably schizophrenic, was mentally sound during plotting of crime, which was recorded by FBI agent.
lead_paragraph: Chiheb Esseghaier, 33, and Raed Jaser, 37, were convicted this year largely on the strength of secret recordings made by an F.B.I. agent.

headline.main: Canada: Two Men Get Life Sentences in Plot to Derail Train From New York
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Canada: Two Men Get Life Sentences in Plot to Derail Train From New York

snippet: Chiheb Esseghaier, 33, and Raed Jaser, 37, were convicted this year largely on the strength of secret recordings made by an F.B.I. agent.
